text: What does the Directional Light simulate?
skills: Identify the default elements in a new Scene

options.text: An overhead light in a room

feedbackCorrect: The Directional Light object simulates the sun in a Scene built in the 3D Template. You can move and rotate the Directional Light to indicate a time of day or create a mood in your Scene.
feedbackIncorrect: The Directional Light object simulates the sun in a Scene built in the 3D Template. You can move and rotate the Directional Light to indicate a time of day or create a mood in your Scene.
